message: Hi everyone! I'm excited to kick things off and look forward to connecting with each of you. It's early, so no reason to target anyone yet—let's keep communication open and friendly. I'm interested in hearing your initial thoughts and seeing where our conversations lead. Good luck to us all, and let's have a fun game!

Here’s to a fair and engaging game—may the best player win! Looking forward to our conversations and seeing how this unfolds. Good luck to all!
